actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to impose certain limitations on the value of honorariums which may be accepted by a person employed by a Member, or by a committee, of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to impose certain limitations on the value of honorariums which may be accepted by an employee of a Member or committee of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to impose certain limitations on the value of honorariums which may be accepted by a person employed by a Member, or by a committee, of the House of Representatives.
